_header: Dievs wous garde byewsser tidings I you bring
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler TM 354; cf. 1643.
_description: Welcome Sir Christmas — three 4-line stanzas with refrain, ‘Nowell’, and 7-line burden: ‘Nowell nowell nowell nowell / Who ys ther that syngeth so’

BLAdd5665.First Lines:
Dievs wous garde byewsser tydynges Y yow bryngA mayde hathe
                    born a chylde full yong…
BLAdd5665.Last Lines: …And syng with vs now joyfullyNowell etc.
